de.unlixx.runpng.png

Class PngCRC32

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.zip.CRC32
      • de.unlixx.runpng.png.PngCRC32
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.zip.Checksum

    public class PngCRC32
extends java.util.zip.CRC32
    Convenience extension of the CRC32 checksum calculator.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PngCRC32() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void updateInt(int n)
      Updates the checksum with the four bytes of an int.
      void updateShort(int n)
      Updates the checksum with the two bytes oa a short.

    • Method Detail

      • updateInt

        public void updateInt(int n)
        Updates the checksum with the four bytes of an int. MSB first.
        Parameters:
        n - The int to use for update.

      • updateShort

        public void updateShort(int n)
        Updates the checksum with the two bytes oa a short. MSB first.
        Parameters:
        n - The int to use for update. Only the last 16 bits are used.
